SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
I'd bet anything that there 
are spirits in this world.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Well met, Watcher. You have been summoned
unto this land to bear witness to the battle
between us witches and the foul scourge
known as the Calamity. I am the Arch Witch, and on behalf
of all in the Witchdom Pulchra,
I bid you welcome.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Not sure what some of those words mean there,
lady, but I think you got the wrong guy.
I'm just here to find some spirits.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
It is by neither volition nor coincidence that
you have come to Pulchra, Watcher; out of all
the countless beings traversing the Conjoined
Worlds, you were chosen for our summons.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Well, whatever. I'm here to find spirits,
like I said. Once I do that, I'll just swing
on outta this Witchdom place and leave
you to it.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Unacceptable. You are the Watcher;
to bear witness to our battle with
the Calamity is your solemn duty. Until you have seen that duty done,
I will not permit your search.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
You cannot, for it is your destiny. Now then. One of our own awaits outside
to serve as your escort. She will take
care of you from this point forth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.text: Got something in the water there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.text:
Well, that was a whole lot of chatter about
stuff I couldn't care less about. Still probably
won't be able to forget it, though...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.text: Got something on the ground there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.text:
Probably coulda done without knowing
any of...whatever that was. Also, that face looks like
a real meddler.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.text:
Think that weapon's got a face.
Wonder who it could it be?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.text:
All this witchy business ain't for me
to worry about, believe you me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.text: There's some kinda face in the flames.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.text:
Must be giving us some kind of warning
or advice, maybe? Nice of it to offer,
but I'll be deciding things for myself.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.text:
Got some kinda human face
in this tree trunk.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.text:
Heck, I always find myself wanting to go
where someone tells me not to. Guess this
face understands how folks operate.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Got a fire spirit here. Gonna have
to fight it if I want its power.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_001.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_001.text:
Got a water spirit here. Gonna have
to fight it if I want its power.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_002.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_002.text:
Got a wood spirit here. Gonna have
to fight it if I want its power.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_003.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_003.text:
Got a metal spirit here. Gonna have
to fight it if I want its power.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Got a pretty weak spirit here.
I wonder if it'd even do the trick.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_011.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_011.text:
Got a decently powerful spirit here.
Might be worth settling for this one.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_012.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_012.text:
Got a powerful spirit here. Tussling with
this fella is probably gonna end with me
cussin' up a storm...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_013.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_013.text:
Cripes, this spirit's got power for days!
Lot of things might happen if I take it on,
but winning ain't one.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Looks like you made it.
I knew there was something off
about the way you jumped.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, it appears the Watcher can see through
all manner of tricks. You must know exactly
what I intend to do, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So it's finally time to set out...
Oh, I feel like my heart is going
to beat right out of my chest!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_030.text:
*sigh* Yes, I thought so as well.
Thank you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_210_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_210_CU.text: Keeping watch is a rough beat.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_250_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_250_CU.text:
Not sure there's even a point
to this whole 'watching' deal.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_260_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_260_CU.text:
Really gotta put an end to this
dang thing already...

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Victory now lies beyond the witches' grasp;
aiding them is naught but wasted effort.
Yet you can end all with a thought,
if you but desire it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Sorry about that, champ, but I still
got stuff that needs doing here.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: This is known. You may leave all to me.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: Just butt out already.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: Sure. Go ahead and end it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Wise choice, Watcher. By your will
alone is the fate of the witches set.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_000.text: Well, heck. Looks like I got the boot.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Lady said something about an escort 
waitin' for me out here, but...

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_020.text:
There we go. You must be the escort
the Arch Witch was talking about, eh?

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Trust not the witches, Watcher, for they
would use your power only to traverse
the Conjoined Worlds for themselves.
Understood? Trust not the witches.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_040.text:
What was that about? I'm starting to think
this world's gonna be more trouble than
it's worth. Best bag some spirits and get
outta here quick as I can.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_050.text: Oh! The Watcher! You're here! Also, crap! The Arch Witch and Mother are going to be super furious with me!

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Gotta admit though, I was expecting the Watcher
to be a bit more...I dunno. Dignified, I guess?
Also older. You seem like a real nobody.
...I mean, no offense.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Sorry to disappoint. Also, I didn't ask for
a field trip chaperone, so how about you
just hurry up and tell me what I'm supposed
to be watching here?

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_080.text:
So the Arch Witch didn't explain anything?
Not Calamity, not the witches, nothing?

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Right then! Intros. So I'm Lita Caryx,
one of the witches of the blue. That's important, because here in the
Witchdom Pulchra, witches are divided
into five separate colors, and each
of them has their own land.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Castle Black Swan on Ebon Lake is
home to witches of the black.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_110.text:
To the west, you've got the Leone Bianco
Palazzo, home to witches of the white.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_120.text:
The Flame Fortress blazes in the south;
it's home to witches of the red.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_130.text:
This pinwheel here is the central place
for witches of the yellow. It's called
the Dusk Pinwheel. Neat, huh?

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, and last but not certainly not least,
there's the Tree of the Forever Young,
which is home to witches of the blue,
like myself.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Our world is a land formed by the balance
of vast spiritual energies, all of which
are centered around the domain of the
Arch Witch: the Brilliant Tower.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Once each generation, a Calamity strikes
and threatens this balance—a Calamity
that takes a different form each time
it appears. This generation's Calamity is now
upon us, and we face nothing less
than the very crystallization
of our world.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Calamities are a side effect of our magic usage,
which means they tend to advance on places with
great power. So right now, the crystallization
is slowly taking over all of our domains.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_180.text:
I'd suggest you just stop using magic,
but I suppose that wouldn't go over well.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Exactly so, which is why we have to stand
against the Calamity. If we don't fight it—
and win—we won't be witches anymore.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_200.text:
But it's not all doom and gloom!
Fighting a Calamity is one of those
once-in-a-lifetime things, so we try
to make it a real party. I mean, you know. Break out the big
spells, throw everything we've got into
each battle... Just have fun while we
try not to die, basically!

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Kinda tough for a pacificist like me to
wrap my noggin around, but I think I get
the general deal. You sure got that shiny
look in your eyes, at least.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_220.text:
Right, so here's where you fit in:
as this generation's Watcher, it's
your sacred duty to oversee our war.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_230.text:
All righty, then. Guess I'll just figure
out where I wanna go...uh, watch.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_040.text:
How am I not supposed to trust witches
when they're runnin' the whole world?

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
You're the Watcher, right?
Uh, but why are you just...spacing out?

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_090.text: Told me not to trust the witches. But this place is called the Witchdom for cripes' sakes, so can't really see what good that advice is gonna do a guy.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
What did this person look like?
Any distinguishing features?

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_110.text:
Couldn't see their face. And even if I could,
I just got here like I said, so I don't exactly
know what you want from me.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_120.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_120.text:
Huh. Yeah, okay. That's totally fair.
Sorry for the inquisition. So let's do intros. I'm Lita, one of the
witches of the blue, and the Arch Witch
told me to be your guide.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_121.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_121.text:
Fair enough. Okay, so I'm Lita, one of
the witches of the blue. The Arch Witch
told me to be your guide.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, no need to get into all that.
You're the Watcher. That's all I need.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_150.text:
Soooooo? Anything you want to ask up front,
or do you just wanna get to the watching?

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_170.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_170.text: How about you give me the lowdown?

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_180.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_LITA_100_CUT_000_180.text:
Good idea. Always nice to know what
you're dealing with right up front. So Pulchra's witches are divided into
five colors, each with their own land.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Feels like we got some dangerous places
around here. Might be a good idea
to start with one of them.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_LITA_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yep. That's what my gut says,
and it's never wrong.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Been a while.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: It sure has, Grete. You doing well?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Can't complain. Who's this?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
The Watcher. The Arch Witch's got me keeping
an eye on... Er, showing him around.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Hey there, gal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Um... Actually, let's do this later.
Things are fine here. No worries. Bye.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Boy howdy, talk about your rough intros.
I kick her dog by accident, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oh, she's just shy. Give her time to
get used to you, and then maybe you
can hold an actual conversation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oooh, look! A Calamity fiend! How lucky!
Now I can say I fought it so I could protect
the Watcher, which is totally awesome!
Uh, so you just stand back there, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: HERO
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Nope! I'm doing this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: HERO
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Stand back. Got it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
I'm so sorry, Grete. I know this is the
battleground of the black, but I just
sort of lost track of my color and...
You know. Went for it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oh, that's all right—I know that's just the
sort of person you are. I'll make sure the
Black Sage doesn't find out, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Heck, she can chat with you just fine,
so when can her and me talk?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Your job is to watch. Not talk.
Maybe focus on that, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
A stranger has stolen victory on the
battleground of the black. This will
earn me a scolding most fearsome
from the Black Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Didn't mean to overstep there, lady,
but I thought what mattered was beating
this Calamity deal however we can.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Just leave. I don't want you here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Huh. Guess I should do less fighting
and more watching, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
The Arch Witch said you're free to do as
you like, but that's a problem for Grete.
Sadly, I fear she's just going to wither
more and more.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: The Watcher? More like the halfwit!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Well, I lost that one—but at least
I got Grete to talk to me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
I seriously have no idea
why you're the Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Why have you come to the battleground
of the yellow, Lita?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Gotta babysit the Watcher.
Arch Witch and my mother's orders.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Oh dear. I'm terribly sorry to hear that. You do have perfect timing though, because there's a matter I want to discuss. It appears the Dusk Pinwheel and the Yellow Sage have flown off somewhere.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Uh, sorry. Pinwheels fly here?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
What else that size could be flying
around out there if not the pinwheel?
Also, we're talking, and you're supposed
to be watching. Don't interrupt.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Anyway, Willma, I know it's weird for the
Dusk Pinwheel to fly off in the middle of a
Calamity, but if the Yellow Sage is with it,
I'm sure everything's fine.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Sure, assuming they come back.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Willma, look! A Calamity fiend!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I, a proud witch of the yellow,
will handle this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: HERO
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: All yours.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: HERO
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Nope! This one's mine!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
It proved a difficult fight without
the Yellow Sage, but we managed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
By the way, your pinwheel
went up and flew off again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Argh! I knew it! It's all my fault!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
You said you had something you wanted
to talk about earlier, Willma. What was it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Oh, it's nothing. The Dusk Pinwheel is a
problem for witches of the yellow, so I
can't possibly discuss it with a blue witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Gotcha. Well, hang in there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Thanks, Lita.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I don't mean to pry here, but are relations
bad between all you witch folks just
because of the colors?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
It's not that relations are bad—it's more a
matter of etiquette. It's considered rather
inappropriate for one color of witch to
interfere with the affairs of another.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Well, I'm the Watcher, and this color stuff
doesn't mean squat to me—and since I'm
curious about that nifty flying pinwheel
deal, I'm gonna go check it out.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: As you say, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
This is the first time I've seen someone
other than a witch fight. How interesting.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Non-witches just can't cut it. *sigh*
I should have seen that coming.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Well, well. If it isn't the infamous Watcher.
Do you really think this stranger's blood
is fit for joining with us witches, Lita?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
I know how much that sort of thing interests
you, Red Orchid, but I'm pretty sure that's not
what the Arch Witch meant when she told me
to serve as his escort.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text: Which means she's probably sneaking a peep at us in her magic mirror as we speak— and I'm sure she'll love it! Ha!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
So you have come to the Witchdom at last,
Watcher. Do enjoy yourself, now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Eee hee! Wonderful! Now let yourself
be captivated by a witch of the red!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
O fiends of the Calamity, enjoy both
pleasure and pain from my crimson fires!
Behna ascatella!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Well, that one certainly doesn't need
anybody to watch over her.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Eh, I wouldn't be so sure. Yes, we fight
with a distinct edge when the Red Orchid
is directly involved in a battle, but she
can't be everywhere at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
So the Calamity's got its own plans for why
and how it attacks? Criminy, this war's
gonna be tougher than I thought.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Hey! What kind of IDIOT goes and steals
someone's limelight like that, huh!? Still, seeing you fight absolutely
did captivate me, so... I want your blood. I want it.
Give it to me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
The Watcher should maybe stick to watching.
Ugh. Begone. I've no need of your blood.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
There isn't much you can do about that.
You just carry out the Arch Witch's orders while
 we protect the Tree of the Forever Young.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Only natural for folks to worry
about their own home.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Oh, I'm sure Mother will protect it.
The real problem is that all the other
blue witches are out fighting while
I'm stuck wandering around with you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Hey, I'm not keeping you here.
You wanna fight? Knock yourself out.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
I CAN'T do that, you dingbat—that's why
I'm so annoyed! Now quit trying to talk to
me about stuff you know nothing about!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Look, let's just go watch over the
next place, okay? That's your duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
You seem a bit unclear on the whole
'watching' aspect of your position.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Can you get this guy out of here already?
He's really getting in the way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
I definitely feel a strange presence
gathering at the Brilliant Tower,
but I almost can't believe it...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
We did it! We've destroyed
all of the crystals!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
Really makes a fella feel good
to see a job well done.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
Wait. It feels like... Yes! The five castles
have all completed their barrier spells!
We've protected the Witchdom!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
I always thought witches were something
we become, but I see now I was mistaken.
We have always been witches from the start.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
We don't save the world—we're part of it.
Do you see? We ARE the Witchdom Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
The world has been screaming for us to help it,
and I finally heard its cries. WE are to blame
for this! WE brought about the Calamities!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
Fiends are the cries of the Calamity,
and one witch is connected to another
by some force that we can't see.
I...I understand that now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
The Calamity is ended, Watcher.
Your duty is nearly complete.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
It would appear you possess the power to
choose your own fate; a choice which is
yours by right. Not even we witches have
the ability to intervene in this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
As for you, Lita, your duty continues:
I bid you experience the Watcher's choices
by his side. Once you have done this,
I will await you in the Brilliant Tower.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
The Arch Witch knows your choices will affect
the fate of the witches of Pulchra, Watcher.
And while I know it's not my place to ask... Well, if you've come to understand anything
about us witches, I just hope you think of us
as you move forward—even just a little.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: You have arrived, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
...And I see you have obtained the power
of a spirit. With your objective thus fulfilled,
it is now the turn of us witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Lita, your destiny has been decided:
you shall shoulder the burden
of the final battle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
But am I strong enough for that?
Because if I fail, the Witchdom will...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
You will have all of the witches of Pulchra
behind you—myself included. Rest easy,
child, for you do not fight alone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I understand—and I'm going to win!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: HERO
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Good luck, Lita.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: HERO
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Wrong! This is MY fight!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Thanks. Watch over me, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
No. This fight belongs to the witches,
and I cannot entrust it to the Watcher.
But thank you all the same—and know
I will carry your feelings into battle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Do you truly intend to do this, Watcher?
This fight holds little meaning for you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
It's my final duty, yeah? You witch gals
have had my back this whole time, and I
wanna wrap it up all nice and neat for you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
If that is how you feel, then so be it—
for even if you lose, Lita will be there.
Let your mind rest easy and fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Cripes, you gals really don't trust me... Well, guess I'll just have to show you some real results!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: We did it! We won!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Yep. Nice job, bud.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Thank you, Watcher. I feel like I only
survived because of all the things
I saw and did when I was with you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
You know something? Maybe the big cheese
in this whole deal isn't the Watcher,
but the witches who travel with him?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Who can say? In any event, Lita has achieved
a great victory—so whatever the future
may hold, Pulchra will be ever secure.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Now then, Watcher. The time
has come for your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shard—
or perhaps it would be better to call it a seed
of the Calamity. Regardless, I would have you
take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Feels like a guy's being eighty-sixed here.
I take it you're telling me to leave and
never come back?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
That is correct. And though you were here
for but a short time, know that we witches
will never forget you... Now begone!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I had a blast, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
It was a real wild ride.
So long!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Lita! Lita, no!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Lita has been turned to crystal.
Her actions, however, have brought
we witches a great victory this day.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Now then, Watcher. The time
has come for your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shard—
or perhaps it would be better to call it a seed
of the Calamity. Regardless, I would have you
take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Kinda feels like a memento of Lita...
Also, are you saying I can't ever come
back here so long as I have this on me?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Correct. Now take your leave.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Well, heck! That wasn't so bad!
Also, there's no way I was gonna lose to
the Calamity when it was in such sad shape.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
So this is the Watcher's true power...
It's incredible!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Thank you, Watcher. And now, at long last,
we are come to your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shard—
or perhaps it would be better to call it a seed
of the Calamity. Regardless, I would have you
take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
You have taken the Calamity Shard into you.
As such, you can never be permitted to
set foot in the Witchdom again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text: Well heck, I get it now: the Watcher's real role is to make sure that not even a tiny bit of the Calamity hangs around.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Wait, Arch Witch! Please! I beg of you, permit me to leave Pulchra.
I would like to travel with the Watcher
and see his journey through to the end.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Ah, but this is a beautiful end indeed.
You are a witch, Lita; your path is yours
to choose. I ask only that you return
to us once you have seen all you can.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text: I will, Arch Witch—and thank you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Right then, Watcher! I'm coming with you!
...And if you try to say no, I'm gonna
smack you in your dumb face SO hard.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
There's no need for all that.
Pull up a seat and join the party.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
The Watcher was defeated, but this is good—
for the battle with the Calamity is one for
witches to fight, and it is only right that we
assume control. Now come, Lita!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
You could have attained the power of a
spirit elsewhere. Why have you chosen
the Brilliant Tower?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
Well, I sorta felt like getting a spirit's power
by ending the Calamity would tie up everything
I've done here as a Watcher all nice and neat. Real humdinger of an ending,
if you ask me. Almost...beautiful.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
Beautiful, you say? Yes, I suppose it is
a fitting end for the struggle between
us witches and the Calamity. I thank you for the choice you have made,
Watcher. But now, it truly falls to you
to decide whether or not this ending
is a beautiful one.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
It's my turn to watch you now, Watcher.
So good luck...and make sure you win!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
Heck yeah! I drew out the spirit's power
from the Calamity and took care of the
dang thing at the same time!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
So this is the Watcher's true power...
It's incredible!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
Thanks to you, Watcher, the beautiful end you
desired is nearly upon us. And so, I would
entrust what remains to you: the Calamity Shard.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
You have absorbed the Calamity Shard. And though
I know not what all it means, I understand this much:
you can never again set foot in the Witchdom,
for we must safeguard it from the Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text: Yep. A beautiful ending, all right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Hang on! This is the Brilliant Tower—
we can't just go waltzing into the place
without the Arch Witch's permission.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Eh, it's fine.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Did the Arch Witch call for you?
Because I haven't heard anything.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Well, I guess we're in here now...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Your duty is not complete, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Sorry about this, lady, but I'm not actually
worried so much about whatever duty you think
I've got. See, I snagged a spirit, which means
it's time for this guy to skedaddle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
You cannot leave until your duty is
fulfilled. I believe I explained this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Well, this is a real pain in the rear.
Can you do something here, Grey Witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
By fulfilling your duty, the gateway to
the Conjoined Worlds will be thrust open.
The Arch Witch indeed spoke true:
this is your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Take it and begone from the Witchdom—
and do not look to return.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Looks like the gate's open.
So long, ladies!
Be good to each other!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Oh hey, almost forgot to ask...
What's the Grey Witch's deal, anyway?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Ask yourself this, Watcher: what color
is formed by the merging of them all? Indeed, it is grey—and I, the Grey Witch,
am the ultimate being, one who carries the
strength of all the colors of the Witchdom. And from this point forward, Pulchra will
assume the hue of the grey, as will all
the witches that abide within.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Sounds pretty drab if you ask this guy.
So what happens after Pulchra goes grey?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Once this is done, I will turn all the Conjoined Worlds to grey— all life to grey. Aye, for this is the way the universe ought to be—yourself included, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Can't say I much care for the thought
of Miyako City turnin' grey.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: If that happens, we're gonna have words.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Huh. Better just fight you now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Well, you can't turn anything grey until
you beat the Arch Witch and all her buds—
and I got a feeling she and Lita aren't
gonna let that happen.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Know what? I changed my mind. I think I'm
just gonna wipe the floor with you now and
keep Miyako City nice and colorful.
Mind helping a guy out, Arch Witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
You are no longer the Watcher, and must
take your leave from this place at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
...And yet, grey magic is powerful indeed.
So before I bid you hence, I will make use
of your strength one last time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
I feel my power...fading? No... No!
Must I truly wait for the next Calamity!?
The next Watcher!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
I figured you'd pull through,
former Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
I got a name, you know: Tsunanori Mido.
Figure you could call me that, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Mmm, we'll see. But you have a
final duty to take care of first.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Fine, fine. I'll take your dang Calamity
Shard and get the heck outta town.
So long, Lita.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Farewell, Tsunanori! I'll see you
again in another world!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
In the name of Grete, witch of the black,
I command you to burst!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
That's AMAZING, Grete! You took out
all of the Calamity fiends at once!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: That's not quite accurate; it wasn't me that did it, but this grey staff. It's powerful—so powerful—and... and I think I'm afraid of it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Which is why I need you to take it. If I keep it,
it'll eventually start fighting with my own staff,
and that's no good for anyone. A witch only has
room in her heart for one staff, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Well, I suppose I don't mind—but if you
ever need it back, just let me know.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Blech! Okay, this is totally yours now.
I am NOT going to haul that thing around
and wait for it to start fighting with
my staff. No way, nuh-uh, not happening.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
If you're looking for a pack mule,
I'm sure you can rent one somewhere. Also, it's a real nice staff and all,
but I get the feeling there's something
a bit off about it...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Ah, excellent timing. It turns out I actually
need the grey staff back—for without it,
I won't be able to defeat the Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
But what about your staff, Grete?
Won't they just start fighting?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, which is why I'm going to
throw mine away. The old
thing is weak anyway.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
No! You can't! That staff awakened you to
black magic, remember? Look, at least let
me hang onto it for you, all right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: ...Yes, I suppose you're right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Now as for the grey staff...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
...Really? All right, I understand.
I won't say anything to anyone else.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Guess I'll hang on to the black staff, maybe?
By the way, what were you and Grete
whispering about back there?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You're the Watcher, not the Snooper—
so stop trying to butt in on a
gal's private conversations!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Grete said this old castle is where she
first got her hands on the grey staff.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
You serious there? Why didn't you
swing by and check it out right away?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
This is a place witches must never go...
although hearing that only makes a girl
want to do it all the more! We'd all used to try and come in here as kids—
sort of a test of courage, I guess. But the
one time I tried, the door was locked, and I
couldn't find another way inside.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Still, kids do manage to get in from
time to time, and it always turns into
a humungous kerfuffle. But since I don't remember Grete ever
stirring up a fuss, she must have only
came here in the very recent past.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Anyway, I got delayed by a bunch of things
and never ended up getting back this way—
but now that we're here, I really need to
give it a thorough look-around. I mean, Grete's been acting SUPER weird.
Did you see how she just tossed her
staff out? That's very not like her.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Yeah, that grey staff was really giving me
the willies. Felt more like the power of the
Calamity than anything from you witch gals.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Okay, it's actually sort of creepy when
you start talking like a real Watcher... 
Anyway, let's just check this place out.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Now hang on just a second there.
Thought you said this place was locked.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
It is—but we know Grete got in,
so there HAS to be a way in.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Yeah, okay. Lemme take care of this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: There you go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Seems like most anybody could come in here
if they just...you know. Opened the door.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Heck, there's nothing here but a mirror.
Whole lotta fuss over nothing...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Maybe we're supposed
to talk to it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Just so.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I have been ever so delighted at the sudden
increase in guests. Now please, make a request
of me. What does your heart desire?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Not really why I'm here, bud, but thanks for the
offer. How about you just tell me about the witch
who swung by here earlier and left with a staff.
How'd she get her hands on it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A question, is it? Excellent! Indeed,
one of my duties is to answer any
and all questions asked of me. As for your witch, she made but one request:
a wish for power. Such a simple request
deserved a simple answer, so I provided
her with a staff of great might.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Sure, but who'd you get the staff from?
You got someone else hanging around here?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: The staff came from beyond that gate.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Alas, you cannot pass through it;
it is a gateway for witches alone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Fine then, lemme change up the question:
what sort of staff is it? I mean, it's clearly
powerful, but it feels a little different
from other witchy stuff I've been seeing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A fine question! That is a grey staff,
the ultimate staff, hewn from the lifelong
efforts of the Grey Witch. And speaking of
the Grey Witch...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
What are you gossiping about,
young man!? Show some manners!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: You the Grey Witch there, lady?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Me? A witch? Ha! Oh, there truly are nothing
but idiots like you on the outside! No wonder
they're having trouble with the Calamity. But now that the grey staff has abandoned this
castle, the Calamity will soon be brought to
heel—and on that day, witches of all colors
will bow before the power of the grey!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I don't know what the power of the grey is,
but I know we don't need it! We can take out
the Calamity just fine on our own, thank you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
In that case, you will never attain the victory
you desire. Not that it matters...because you
will also never leave this castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Well, I think you just filled in most of
the blanks, so thanks a bunch for that.
Guess we'll be off now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Did you not hear me, you rude boy!?
You cannot leave this castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Lady, I'm a Watcher.
I go wherever I want.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A Watcher!? Damnation!
Stop them, you lot!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
That's your classic stalling technique right
there. We gotta hurry back to Grete.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Where's Grete?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: She went to Castle Black Swan—right after unleashing a magic so powerful it destroyed every Calamity fiend in sight! Oh, but before she took off, she said: 'Now the way to Castle Black Swan is clear.' Er, whatever that means.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The only way to the castle is through
an underground waterway. Let's go!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: I hear Grete went to Castle Black Swan?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, she came through a short while ago.
But you may not pass, for you are not
a witch of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Hate to pull rank on you there, but I'm
the Watcher—and right now, I've got an
urge to watch that castle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The Watcher? ...Very well, do as you wish.
But know this! The guards of this waterway
care not for your esteemed position, Watcher;
they will attack any who are not of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Appreciate the tip.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Wish I could've had myself
an easier trip to the castle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The power of the grey is greater than the black;
I learned as much when I wielded this staff.
Now leave the fight with the Calamity to me,
for I can win the day with ease!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You mustn't surrender yourself to the power
of the grey, Grete, for it is no different
from the Calamity itself—and using such
a power to best it would be no victory.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yet black magic is no match for the
Calamity! Indeed, it is useless!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Feel like this is the real battle against
the Calamity, maybe? A witch having to learn
for herself the meaning of victory, I mean.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: This black staff is your true staff.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yeah, I dunno what you're thinking with this
whole 'grey staff' business, but you gotta
put that thing back where you found it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
If you enter into this conflict, Watcher,
that witch will forfeit her life. However, I have mastery of a trick which can
make it so the grey staff is damaged
while the witch is left unharmed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You're right that I got no beef with this
witch lady, but can't say I exactly trust
you here, either.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: And yet, what choice have you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Can't argue with that.
Guess I'll handle that staff.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
While the power of the grey staff remains,
Grete, I want you to cast a spell with me—
using your own black staff, of course.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Right!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I can't believe I got to cast a spell
with the Black Sage herself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
And why not, Grete? For it was I who gave you
that staff in order to awaken the power of
the black that sleeps within you. It is a staff of unhurried power that
matches your own talents within.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You are the type who makes slow progress—
a trait which gives you the ability to
impact things greatly. I know you wish to proceed at the same speed as
other youthful witches, for that is what it means
to be young. But such feelings created an opening
that invited the power of the grey.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I should have explained that to you more directly,
but I thought your haste and fretting would lead
to growth as a witch of the black, and so left
you to your own devices. Pray forgive me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I...I fear you praise me overmuch, Black Sage.
But I will continue in my own unhurried way
to work hard and hone my skills as a proud
witch of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Well, looks like we're all good here.
Back to watching stuff!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: A moment, Watcher. I believed we had no need of your presence on our battlefield, but see now that I was mistaken; times such as these are exactly when we need your overarching perspective. You have helped me to see this, and I am grateful beyond words.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Not sure I deserve all that, seeing as I didn't
exactly sign up for this Watcher business.
But hey, sounds like it worked out for you,
so I guess I'm happy enough.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Thank you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Heck, this thing's just huge when you see it
up close. Not sure why a pinwheel's giving me
the heebie-jeebies either, but there it is.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Ha ha! Did you actually think we'd have
to fight a pinwheel? Anyway, let's go talk
to the Yellow Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
You cannot enter without permission, witch of
the blue—and what's more, that one there is not
even a witch! Aye, but the pinwheel is in foul
spirits right now. Foul spirits indeed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text: Is that why it flew off on its own?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Nay, its foul temper is the result of that,
not the cause. Someone caused the pinwheel's
compass to move, which made it float off
this way and that. That is why the pinwheel is in such
foul spirits—and why I am, as well.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
You think this is the deal
Willma was talking about?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Pah! Willma is an apprentice witch, and nothing
more—she lacks the strength to interfere with
the compass. If it were so simple as all that,
I would have already returned the thing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Incredible magical power is required to move
the compass—the kind of power that shortens
one's very life. I can ill afford to expend such power in the
midst of a war with the Calamity, which is
why I cannot manipulate the compass.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Never! Out of the question! A witch of a
different color can never be permitted
to manipulate our compass!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Enough of this! The strange one here has
overstayed his welcome, which has caused
the pinwheel's foul mood to descend ever
deeper into brood and bile. How am I going to put this right?
Ugh. I feel a headache coming on.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Pinwheel zipped off somewhere, too. Seems like
the best thing here is to get that compass deal
back to normal, but sounds like that's gonna
be a real pain in the rear.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
We went to the Dusk Pinwheel and heard
all about the compass situation from the
Yellow Sage. Know anything about that, Willma?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
...It's my fault. I got close to the compass,
and it angered the pinwheel.
Oh, I really AM a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Don't talk about yourself like that!
We've been friends since we were little,
and a golem could never have become
an apprentice witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text: But everyone else already passed their Witchterms, and I haven't even been allowed to take mine! ...It's because I'm a golem.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text: I did have powerful magic—but now everyone else is a full witch, and I'm still an apprentice. My strength in the past was just a golem's strength, and that's why I'm not growing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Don't think you're gonna be able to get through
to her. Gotta ask though, is she really a golem?
Also, what's a golem?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Artificial life-forms hewn from the earth by
witches of the yellow. They can do manual labor
and other simple tasks, though I'm not sure if
they ever made one that looks human.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Eh, she seems pretty much like
all the rest of you to me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Better ask about that compass deal too,
because Willma definitely went near it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Oh, for heaven's sake... What is it now!?
You people can't just keep barging into
the pinwheel whenever you like!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I want to know why you've never let Willma
take her Witchterms. She and I are the same
age, so she should've been able to take them
around the same time as me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Tsk! You blue witches have such a lack of
discipline. Always running about meddling
in the affairs of other colors.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Well aware, thanks. But here's the thing:
Willma's so upset about it, she actually
thinks she might be a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Don't be daft! If we could make golems with
the ability of witches, we'd simply mass-
produce them to fight the Calamity for us! Willma's case is just a matter of timing.
We have to work around to her turn, find a
suitable world for the exam, and so forth.
There's nothing sinister about it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Sure, okay. But then why'd the pinwheel
get all bent out of shape the moment she
walked up to the compass?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text: She got a reaction from the compass just by approaching it? I find that hard to believe; she'd have to have either the most perfect or the most terrible affinity with it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I want to try one more time to see if the
pinwheel finds me worthy—and if it does,
I want to finally take my Witchterms!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Not even I can say what will happen if you
approach it again, girl—particularly if your
affinity does turn out to be poor.
You could lose your magic—or even your life. But I imagine you're prepared for that,
so perhaps...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Just...just a little more...
Please find me worthy...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I can help this child, Watcher...
but I will require your aid.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Unknown_Person
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text: Guess that seals the deal, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.text: Guess it went well for Willma.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.text:
It must have—the Dusk Pinwheel has
returned to its original location.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
If you seek Willma, she is resting within.
And yes, she was successful; I'll schedule
her Witchterms as soon as possible.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Don't bother. I'm not going to be a witch.
The compass showed me a different path. I'd never even considered doing something else
with my life, but now that I am, it's lifted
a huge weight off my shoulders. So no, I won't be a witch. Instead,
I'm going to visit worlds with the Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Will you bring me with you, Watcher?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Sure thing. Let's roll.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Maybe you're better off being a witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Thank you. And pray forgive me,
Yellow Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
If that is your decision, I must accept it.
However, this is the first time I have ever
heard of a Watcher leaving with a witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Oh man, this lady's staring a hole right
through me... Happy thoughts, Tsunanori.
Just keep smiling like you didn't butt
right into this mess in the first place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
The Dusk Pinwheel is returned to its
rightful place, and Willma has forged
for herself a new path. With the pinwheel now o'erflowing with magic,
it is time for me to put the finishing touch
on these events.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
So long as I, the Yellow Sage, stand ready,
I shall never permit the crystals of the
Calamity to take root in our lands! O Dusk Pinwheel! Gather the power of
this land and us witches of the yellow,
and rid us of the Calamity's menace!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Okay, SERIOUSLY!? What the hell!?
I sounded SO cool and decisive there,
but now you've gone and killed it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I would not permit it even if
the Watcher were willing, child.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
That lady was onto me all along...
Good thing I didn't make the wrong choice.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
The witches of Pulchra have rules, Willma:
you go to another world for your Witchterms,
and determine based on that experience whether
or not you wish to become a full witch. THAT is the meaning of the path the compass
has shown you—it has naught whatsoever to do
with this Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
...I understand, great sage, and will patiently
await my Witchterms—but in order to do that,
we must first defeat the Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
You sure about this, Willma? You wanted to
be a witch so much, and... Well, to be honest,
you don't even know if you can trust this guy.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I appreciate the concern, but I'll be fine.
The compass only showed me the path; I'm the
one who decided to take it, and I'm the one
who'll take responsibility.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: And as for you, mister: I get what Willma's saying, but if anything happens to her, the Witchdom will never forgive you. Also, you can take her AFTER you finish watching over the Calamity, so get to watching already!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
This Watcher thing is one
heck of a responsibility...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
We have to achieve victory over the Calamity
quickly—for Willma, as well as everyone else.
So get moving, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I suppose the truth always comes out eventually.
I also knew Willma would realize it at some point,
which is why I wanted her to take her Witchterms
as soon as she possibly could. But those other old crones dithered and
delayed, and now we must deal with it
in the middle of a Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
So Willma being a golem is why
the compass went all haywire?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Did I not tell you before she lacks such
strength? While a golem is essentially a
mass of magical power, such a thing is not
enough to explain the compass's behavior.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text: So if the compass just moved on its own, it means you need to acknowledge Willma's strength! That's why the Dusk Pinwheel keeps flying around—it wants you to get the message!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
...Could it be? Am I the one who doesn't
understand? Am I the one who doesn't
believe in Willma? Am I just the same as
all those other crones? Oh, by the hells!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
