I'm so sorry, Willma! I have watched you
grow since the day of your birth, and yet
did not believe you possessed the strength
to overcome your limits as a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Then please permit me to approach the compass.
If it has deemed me worthy, it should return to
its proper place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I suppose it isn't the way of the witch
to worry about worst-case scenarios... Very well, Willma. I will allow it.
Fie, but it is vexing that I was the
one being so fickle about all of this.
I almost cannot bear the thought.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
If you seek Willma, she is resting within;
she stretched her magical power to the limit
in order to maintain her golem body. Oh, but I was so worried watching it.
I thought she might return to the earth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Nonetheless, this should force the old crones
into letting her take the Witchterms. For who
are we to judge when she has been found
worthy by the Dusk Pinwheel itself?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
If this is your choice, I will allow it.
You are free, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Just the type of sound advice
I would expect from you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Willma, you go to another world for your
Witchterms, and determine based on that
experience whether or not you wish to
become a full-fledged witch. THAT is the meaning of the path the compass
has shown you—it has naught whatsoever to do
with this Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
It's still kind of hard to believe you're a golem,
Willma, but... Well, look. What I DO know is
that we always wanted to become witches
together, so I want you to keep at it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text: I do want to be a witch! That hasn't changed. It's just that... Well, I can see a different possibility, and I guess I want to take my chances on it. After all, doing things differently is the witches' way, right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Well, no matter where you go or what you do,
you'll always have friends in the Witchdom.
Don't forget that, all right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
You can take Willma with you once you're
done overseeing the Calamity, Watcher.
Until then, she needs to continue performing
her duties as a witch of the yellow.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text: Psst! Hey, have you heard the gossip?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
What gossip? I haven't heard anything.
Also, is that really something we should
be talking about in front of the Watcher?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Hey, you two can chatter away like two
birds on a wire for all this guy cares.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Okay, so here's the deal: two witches
of the white are missing!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Is that weird? Feels like that kinda
thing happens during...you know. War.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Not like this! See, when we go into battle,
we cast enchantments that ensure we have
a complete understanding of each other's
locations before we even engage the enemy.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
So no matter where a witch goes, we always
know just where she is—even if she gets
turned to crystal!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Gotcha. Probably just ran for the hills,
in that case.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Witches don't 'run for the hills,' you dolt!
ALL witches face ruination if the Calamity
prevails, so there's no hill to even run to.
All we can do is stand and fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Well sure, that's the game everybody talks,
but I'm sure there's all kinds of witches
out there—including a few who don't wanna
die in a fight. I mean, did that not occur to you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
It absolutely did NOT! These missing witches
have CLEARLY been caught in some kind of
awful...something, and we have to find them! So while I know your Watcher work is
important, this has to take priority.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Welp, I suppose a fella can count this
as 'keeping watch' if he squints.
So where you gals wanna look?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
We don't exactly have any clues, so...
What about you? Know anything?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Hey, I thought gossiping was bad!
Also, I don't know a thing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Fine timing, m'lady! We just saw two people who
looked like the missing witches enter the mine.
We were going to pursue them, but thought we
should let the witches know first.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
That was the correct decision. Spirits are
known to appear within the mine, so it
would be most dangerous for you squires.
Now please wait here while we investigate.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Of course, m'lady.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Why in the world would those two
have wandered into a mine?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Do witches even need to mine stuff?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Of course. While we can do anything with enough
magic, having raw materials like ore allows us
to create things more easily—and with less
magical power—than we could otherwise.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Fair enough. Still, I don't see any pickaxes
around here, or people to swing 'em.
This place abandoned, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Witches don't mine materials by hitting rocks with pointy sticks—though now that we're down here, I might as well show you how we do go about it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh, there's a good one!
It's perfect for your first time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Yeah, no. Those were fiends.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Fiends that dropped RAW ORE! Look, this
is just way easier—they dig up the stuff,
then we...you know? Make 'em share a bit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
A bit? This looks like all of it!
I actually feel bad for those critters...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, now that your little bleeding heart
understands how we mine, we should return
to searching for the wayward witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Looks like we had a cave-in.
You okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yup, I still got all my pieces.
Was that because of the mining?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I can't say for certain, but I doubt that
fiend was strong enough to cause a cave-in.
Now let's get some light in here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Boy howdy, do I ever love that witchy stuff.
Still, we came here to search for witches,
and now someone's gonna have to search for us.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh, I'm sure the squires outside are
already hurrying off to get help.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Hello? Anyone there!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Bingo.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Right here!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We felt a rumbling from the direction of the mine
and came to investigate. We thought it strange
that there were two squires at the entrance,
so we went deeper and voila! Here you are.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Goodness! You're the Watcher, aren't you?
Oh, but this is just our lucky day!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Tell me about it. Those two squires told us
they saw the missing witches enter the mine,
so we went deeper and voila. Here you are.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Missing witches...? Ah, I see. Those
squires must be spreading the rumors.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, as you can clearly see,
we're not missing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
But you are the pair everybody's
been worried about, yeah?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
It certainly seems that way—though I don't
have the faintest idea why they're telling
everyone we've gone missing. Perhaps those
squires just have it out for you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Ha! I can't wait to see the look on their
faces when they learn the subjects of their
little rumorfest showed up to help you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
And with that, we're going after them.
Be well, you two!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Appreciate it, ladies.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We came to save them, but they saved us—
kind of demoralizing, if you ask me. I mean, I honestly thought they ran off.
Feelin' a bit ashamed of myself over here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
C'mon, you're overthinking it.
All's well that ends well, right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Psst! Hey, have you heard the gossip?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
If you mean the story about how two 'missing'
witches ended up rescuing the Watcher's party
from a cave-in, then yes. Also, that's not
gossip—every word is true.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I hear they were even praised for their
actions by the White Sage herself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Meanwhile, I almost got the
Watcher killed. *sigh*

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Aw, cheer up! Gloom isn't like you.
That said, we need to catch those
two suspicious squires on the double.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
That we do—and this time,
I'm gonna be the one who succeeds!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Sure you wanna be so gung-ho about it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Impeccable timing, Watcher. We just chased
those two squires into the greenhouse,
and you were here to see it all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Leave the rest to me; we talked to
them last time, so we can confirm
if it's truly them or not.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yes, I suppose even a lowly squire can't
be taken into custody without evidence.
Go on—one of us will be right behind you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Cripes, you ladies trying to grow
a jungle in here or what?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Nice tip there, thanks. Also, I bet those
squire fellas are wishing they didn't
get chased into this place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I'll start searching here, Watcher.
Why don't you head in that direction?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I saw the squires over there!
After them!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: There.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You really think we should be
heading in this far?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Well, this place is something else.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Cripes, that was close.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Are you all right, Watcher!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yeah, thanks. Almost went and got
myself turned into supper there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Unfortunately, the squires WERE supper.
All that's left is their armor.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Mmm, I see.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
That looks like their gear, all right.
Guess we'll never know what they were
trying to pull with this whole mess,
but at least it's over and done with.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, shucks. Now we'll never know what
they were targeting you for.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Should just ask 'em ourselves, maybe.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You mean with necromancy? Er, sorry,
but that's one of the most forbidden
schools of sorcery here in Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Sure, but it's also easier to beg forgiveness
than ask permission right? I bet the White Sage
will let you off easy if you tell her nice.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Are you being serious right now?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Eh, never mind. Let's just go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
The Watcher would like to do some mining, and he
wishes for all of you to accompany him. He would
also like to give you the fruits of this labor
as thanks for the times you have aided him.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I ask that you accept his proposal for two
reasons. First, it is a kind offer, and you
have most definitely earned his thanks.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: But also, I wish to observe him, for I can't help but wonder why he wants to mine for ore in the midst of the Calamity. Please report back if you learn anything suspicious.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Of course.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: With pleasure.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well? How was that? As you see,
I told the truth, even if it
was not the entirety of it. That said, I admit to harboring some doubts
about you, Watcher, because you are most
certainly hiding something. Is there some
reason you're being targeted?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Well, there's this mysterious voice...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Nope! Nothing hidden here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I heard a creepy voice that told me not
to trust the witches. Don't know why it
said that or what the endgame might be,
but there it is.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Still, if this thing can make ME hear its voice,
it could theoretically talk to anyone, yeah?
I mean, not like that explains why they'd
target me in the first place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I appreciate your honesty, and may have an
inkling of who this mysterious voice belongs
to. Regardless, it seems you are VERY
important to them, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Now please make your way to the mines.
They will grow suspicious if you're late.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
What are you scheming here,
Grey Witch...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Thanks for accepting my invite, ladies.
I don't know the first thing about mining,
so I'm hoping you two can help a guy out.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: We'll dig up lots of good stuff!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Say, I heard somebody say there's ghosts
in this mine. You know if that's true?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
There have been occasions in which a spirit
attracts a ghost—it's truly terrifying.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Agreed. Ghosts are the WORST.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yeah, I'm not much for spooks neither,
so let's hold hands if we see one.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Yes, please!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: It's a little dark.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: It doesn't get any brighter.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Why...why did you kill...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: EEEK! S-S-SQUIRE GHOST!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: But...but how is this possible?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: B-b-b-but...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Melting... I'm melting...
My body is melting away...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Nooo! I'm sorry, Mr. Ghost!
Please forgive me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Okay, now this is just getting annoying.
Enough tricks, spirit! Why are you showing
us some imaginary squire ghost!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Don't run... Take me with you...
Take my hand...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Eeek! No, don't hold my hand!
Wait, you CAN'T hold my hand!
I'm YOU! You're ME! Noooooo!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Yup. That oughta do it there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Wasn't sure your pal would get so worked up
over some imaginary squire ghost—guess I 
underestimated how much she hates 'em.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Wait. You KNEW what was
going on this whole time?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Nah, I thought the squires were real at first—
I mean, who wouldn't? But once I saw the pile of
armor in the greenhouse, I realized it made more
sense for them to have never existed at all. I mean, plants that melt down bones?
C'mon. I wasn't born yesterday.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
So what now? Will you reveal our scheme
and hand us over to the White Sage?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Hey, this Watcher does one thing: watchin'.
Still, the both of you should probably go
fess up to the boss, if you ask me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
But hey, lemme ask something first:
you ever hear a weird voice, maybe?
One that says not to trust witches?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Uh, no? I mean, what kind of idiot would
tell a witch not to trust a witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yeah, that's what I was thinking,
but thanks all the same.
Now get going, you two!
You've got a Calamity to beat.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I'm ashamed how ignorant I've been
when it comes to how many kinds
of witches there are in the world.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Eh, don't worry about it—nobody really
knows who other folks are in the end.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Hey, this fella's no witch.
The heck's the deal here?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The 'deal' is that Pulchra has both
witches and squires who serve them.
This guy's a squire. He serves witches.
End of explanation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It saddens me to hear the two of you speak so
indifferently toward a beleaguered squire such
as I, for is it not a rule of this world that we
should offer words of support to social lessers?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Uh... Sure? Sorry about that.
Lemme start over. Hey there, guy. You look bummed.
What happened?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
How very kind of you to ask! You see, m'lord,
I am a squire who uses a particular set of
skills in service to witches of the red. Alas, I have recently been given commands by both
the honorable Red Sage and her glorious elder
sister, the Red Orchid, and now find myself at
a loss over whose order I should prioritize.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Hierarchically, I should put the Red Sage above
all others. The Red Orchid, however, has always
held my skill in high esteem, and I should like
to prove she is not mistaken in that evaluation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Yup, that's a real pickle, all right.
What'd they ask you to do, anyway?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The Red Sage has commanded me to assassinate
the Red Orchid. The Red Orchid, conversely,
has baded me assassinate the Red Sage. I believe the term for my skills would be
'wetwork' in some circles? But to put a
finer point on it, I am an assassin.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I beg you, m'lord! Help me solve this
most vexatious of workplace conundrums!
Whose order should I carry out?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Don't kill either one. I mean, c'mon.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Kill 'em both, I say.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Don't be a dolt! Look, I know those two are
always fighting, but assassination requests?
What are they, children? And you! I know you're a squire, but show
some damn backbone here! You don't have
to follow orders if the orders are insane.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Yeesh! Guess I've got no choice but to get them
to make up. Oh, and you're coming too, Watcher—
I want you to watch the hell out of this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Ignore a witch's command?
I've never considered such a thing!
Could I truly get away with it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Indeed, it is only by carrying out both
sets of orders that I can honor all the tasks
entrusted to me. That seems the best way
I can fulfill my duties in their entirety!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So these two gals are always fighting, eh?
They your run-of-the-mill sister fights,
or is their relationship really that rocky?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The Red Sage is the Red Orchid's little sister—
and the Red Orchid is one of the most powerful
witches in all Pulchra. And while I assume the Red Orchid isn't a fan of
being passed over for sage in favor of her
little sister, I don't know that for sure.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Also, the people around them are constantly
running off on some random whim or another,
which doesn't help matters much.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
What errand brings you here, Watcher?
I hardly need you to look after me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Heard you and your sis were doing the ol'
assassination polka, so came to check on you.
Looks like you're very much not-assassinated
at the moment, so that's swell.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So the Red Orchid put out her own order,
did she? I always knew we were alike
in some rather strange ways. However, your concern is unwarranted,
because I do not fear assassination.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
You sure about that? 'Cause the squire fella
you gave your orders to seemed pretty dang
serious about the whole... Eh, never mind.
I'm clearly wasting my breath here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So hey, how do I get the two of you to kiss and
make up? This is no time for squabbling, what
with the Calamity and all, so if you need us
to play peacemaker, we're happy to do it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I know how foolish this all must seem to you,
given the times we now find ourselves in.
But in truth, the course of events often
hinges upon such things as this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
There is something in the Scorching Tower
that hails from our memories; I wonder if
my sister recalls it? The answer to that question could cause us
to lay down our arms—or more specifically,
to point them at the Calamity instead
of one another.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Tower, memories, got it. We'll swing by
the Red Orchid's place and let her know.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
What errand brings you to
this battlefield?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
There's something from your memories in the
Scorching Tower—something you share with
your sister. Do you remember what it is?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Do you take me for a fool?
I'm not so absent-minded as
to forget something like that! But also, this is none of your business.
I understand her feelings and what she's
attempting to do, and that is enough.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So can I trust you two to make up
and stop trying to kill each other?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
You can. I will set off for
the Flame Fortress at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
After reflecting on things, I realize
ordering your assassination was...
Well, let's call it overkill.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I feel exactly the same, Sister.
Also, I can't believe you remembered it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Yes, and I'll never forget it.
Not for the rest of my life.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: A drink for m'ladies, if it please?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
You? Bringing us tea? Oh ho ho!
Sister, this tea is clearly poisoned.
I advise you to drink it with care.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Worry not, sister of mine: I've cast an
enchantment on myself that detoxifies
everything that I consume.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: GYAAA!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The slimy cur put a poisoned needle
on the CUP instead of in the drink!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Just so, Red Orchid! The tea was a mere
distraction so you might lower your
guard regarding the cup itself. At last, I have done it! Not even
the great Red Orchid was able to
see through my deception!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Sister...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: I'm sorry...Zhu Ya...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I have done it! I carried out both
sets of orders at the same time!
What a great success!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Do you have ANY idea what you've done,
you idiot? They literally JUST made up!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Wait, really? Oh. Oh no.
What HAVE I done!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: You got an antidote, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Errr... No. But I can make one,
provided I have a scale from
the Salamander!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Which means we're headed for the
Scorching Tower. C'mon, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: There's the assassin!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Get in the tower! Quick!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Cripes, we're really short on time here.
What are we gonna do?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
If m'lord would be so good as to draw the
Salamander's attention? While you do,
I'll pick up a scale once it falls off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Really, guy? I thought we'd just...
I dunno. Tear it off, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well, that's a simply ridiculous idea.
Now go on with you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Need anything else there, slugger?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
This will do for now—although it
may prove rather difficult to drink.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I bet they'll manage, seeing as they'll both
be on the wrong side of the dirt if they don't.
Now let's skedaddle back there before your
pursuers catch up to us, eh?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Zhu Ya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'm all right, Sister—although slightly
vexed we had to be saved by the Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
An utter disgrace, to be certain.
Now where is that squire!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I am here, m'ladies, and will accept
any punishment you deem fit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
As we hold some blame here, perhaps we can all
just agree to be more careful in the future.
In the meantime, continue honing your skills so
you might do more good for us witches of the red.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: It would be my pleasure, m'lady.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well then, Sister? Let us use the power of
the Salamander that rests within us to
cooperate and incinerate the Calamity
crystals which blanket our lands.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Quite so. We will begin at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Looks like things are settled.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Yeah, I was gonna squawk if they tried to
punish the squire, but turns out they were
pretty sensible folks in the end.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Now let's get back to your watch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
One of the Red Sage's little riddles, is it?
Well, perhaps I will pose one of my own:
the both of us went to retrieve a thing,
but ended up leaving a thing behind.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'm sure you can puzzle this one out, Watcher.
Once you know both what we went to get
and what was left behind, return here to me,
and I will make peace with my sister.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Looks like it's riddle time for us!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Well? Did you solve the riddle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Won't know until we poke around inside.
What's the deal with this tower, anyway?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Preeetty much just what it looks like.
There's a fire spirit inside called
the salamander.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'm guessing the riddle's connected to
that fire spirit fella. Talk about your
heated questions!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Oh, look! Fireproof gloves. Two, in fact—
one from each pair. So I guess we know
what they came here to retrieve.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
They definitely came here to get
a scale from the Salamander.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well, how about I go on ahead and get the
Salamander's attention while you grab
the gloves and a scale?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Divide and conquer. Let's go!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
That went great! Er, but I don't get why they
left the gloves here. I mean, how did they
plan to get the scale back without them?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Be that as it may, m'lady, I received no
countermanding orders. And as you know,
I am a squire, and the commands I receive
from witches are absolute. And with that, my duty is done.
Farewell to you both!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Stop!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
If that fella's an assassin, he's gotta have
some kind of antidote—and we're gonna
get it out of him no matter what.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So you're only nice to 'em in their home?
I'm startin' to think this squire guy
has a point...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Oh, wonderful idea! Let's just forgive
the cold-blooded assassin!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Didn't say that, exactly. But this squire
clearly wanted us to come see this place,
or he wouldn't have fled here. He thinks that by exposing the whole
situation squires are put in, he might
get us thrown off our game. He probably figures he doesn't have much
of a chance to take us out otherwise.
Anyway, let's just poke around for now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well, well! The two of you clearly want an
antidote! Yet, did it ever occur to you—even
for a moment—that I might not have one?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Nope. You just strike me as an
antidote-havin' kind of fella.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
If there's one thing I loathe,
it's undeserved confidence.
That's enough of you, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Here. The antidote. It's made from a
scale of the Salamander, and should
revive flames that have been lost.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Thanks, guy. You never really
wanted to kill either of them
in the first place, right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Tell that to the two witches who gave
my orders—orders that are absolute.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
But as I have managed to fulfill both
sets of orders, I now answer to no one—
and I will never relinquish this newfound
freedom! Never, I say! Huzzah!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Oh no! He jumped!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Yep. That's one dead squire right there.
Bit of a shame, but hey, it's his call.
Now let's get this antidote where
it needs to go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: R-right. Of course.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Guy fought me. Guy lost.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It saddens me to think I let such a brilliant
squire die in vain—and I swear here and now,
I will never permit such a thing again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So, um... What do you think?
About how that all turned out, I mean?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Not for me to say. You witch gals can all 
noodle over it once the Calamity's done.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text: One of our castles has fallen.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text:
Everything's gonna be covered in crystal
if we don't get this thing turned around.
And the witches inside...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text: Yes. They'll be crystal as well.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text:
But we won't give up because we lost one
castle, so please keep watching over us.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.text:
We lost another castle to crystallization?
Damn it! I knew a battle with the Calamity
would be hard, but THIS hard...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.text:
No, Lita. Don't give in to despair.
There's still hope yet!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.text:
No! A third castle, gone! Are we destined
to lose our battle with the Calamity?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.text:
Well, it sure ain't a piece of good news.
Heck, if this keeps up, I won't even be
able to get the spirit's power—which means
it's time to quit watching and start doing!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.text: I can't believe we've lost four castles... We have to protect the last one, Watcher. We HAVE to. No matter what.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.text:
I hear you, lady—and believe you me,
I'm not gonna pull any punches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_CASTLE_FALLEN_040.text:
It's over... Every castle that protects
Pulchra has been consumed by crystal...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
Well, cripes. Lita disappeared.
Wonder what's gonna happen to this world?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: UI
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text: You acquired a wood spirit's power.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text: Reward for being a Watcher, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_LITA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
Well, so long there, Lita.
And so long to world of witches.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So where do I go watch
over stuff next?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
The Arch Witch said you could go anywhere
you like—apparently things will happen
just by your being there.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Go anywhere, do anything? Surprised this
Watcher deal is so laid-back.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Yeah, it sounds like things will be the
same whether you show up or not.
But hey, what do I know?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Seems like things also change
in places I don't visit.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Even though we witches are all fighting for
our lives, we still don't fully understand the
Calamity's power. We just know we have to drive
it back; everything else can be decided later.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Well, if I help folks just by standing
around watchin' stuff, I should probably
swing by wherever's in the most danger.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: No one's really asking you to help.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So what's the Arch Witch doing while
the rest of you are fighting?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
She keeps vigil in the Brilliant Tower,
ensuring that the balance of spirit
energy is maintained.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So what's the deal with that tower,
anyway? What's with all the light?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Mana gathers there from throughout the
Conjoined Worlds—and that power is the
only reason witches even exist.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So the Arch Witch collects mana and
then just hands it out to everybody?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Well, it's a little different than that. ...Actually, a lot different. ...Actually, completely different. But hey, if that makes sense to you, then go with it. You're the Watcher, not a witch—you don't really need to get it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So if you lose any of your bases,
the spiritual balance collapses and
puts you in a real tough spot?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
That's right. Thankfully, the Arch Witch is
in the Brilliant Tower trying to minimize
the possible impact of such a thing—
and her power is REALLY impressive.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Nice to hear the boss isn't just letting
her employees duke it out while she
sits in the big chair takin' it easy.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
We're not her 'employees,' and we're also
not fighting because she ordered us to.
Every witch has to battle the Calamity—
it's just a thing we do.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Well, this is a completely different
world than mine, I tell you what.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So if you destroy the crystals, the witches win.
And if the world gets covered in crystals,
the Calamity wins. Is that the deal?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Yeah, it's pretty straightforward.
But witches have the power to quickly
turn the tide, which means we can win
no matter how grim it may look.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Sounds like wishful thinking to me.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Well, it's not!

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
There's a whole lot of places I gotta see.
Wonder what I should do?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Lita_Caryx
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Don't you got some kind of magic
that can clone me, maybe?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Sure would've been nice to come to this
world when it wasn't facing a Calamity.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Not sure you would have liked that much,
actually. The Witchdom isn't exactly a
place where strangers can drop by and
stroll around taking in the sights.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Fair enough—but I'd still like to see what
a normal day looks like for a witch.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Huge pass on you doing that
kind of watching, thanks.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Look, I know there's a Calamity raging, but I
still feel like I got a chance to experience
some of the real witchin' life. This Watcher
job actually ain't half-bad.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
It seems the Calamity awakened something in us.
Stuff that wouldn't normally happen is...
Well, it's happening.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Gotta love that.
So what happens next?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Look, I know that this Watcher thing can feel
like you're just standing around doing nothing,
but it's really important that you don't make
those feelings obvious. You get me?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Cripes, this fight's taking forever.
You witches gonna be okay here?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I admit, we're all a bit exhausted—
a disadvantage our enemy sadly lacks.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Gotcha. Take it witches aren't exactly
big fans of long battles, then?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Well, I'M certainly not!
...But I'm also pretty impatient.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Why do you continue
your vigil, Watcher?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: 'Cause that was the agreement.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
More curse than agreement, says I.
Your soul was bound to this vigil by
the Arch Witch's ensorcelled words,
and you have been much deceived.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Wait, the Arch Witch tricked me?
What a crumbum!

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
...That what you were hoping I'd say there?
Well, tough beans, because you definitely
win the 'who's more suspicious' competition. I mean, sure, the Arch Witch might be
usin' me, but you're no different.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Okay, what's the deal here?
What's with the creepy grin?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Guess I'm just looking forward to what
comes next and couldn't help smiling.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Um, this is a war.
You know that, right?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
I do not hate all the witches.
On the contrary, one could say
I love each of them individually.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: Sure. Go on.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
The Arch Witch and sages, however, are a
different tale, for they are corrupt beings
that are neither great nor wise.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: Uh-huh. And?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Without your strength, they would have
no chance of saving Pulchra. Therefore,
there is no value in aiding them.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
And there IS value in my helping you?
Look, I've got a purpose in all this;
I'm not interested in whatever personal
beef you've got going on here.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Then I will make it so you might
accomplish your goal immediately.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: It's not that easy.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: Put your cards on the table, then.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
With magic, right? Just poof and I've
got everything I need? Bud, you must
think I just fell of the idiot wagon.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Uhhh... Wow, okay. Someone's angry.
Did I do something wrong?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
Cripes, this fight's taking forever.
How much longer we got here?

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
Just a little longer; I can feel
the Calamity's strength waning.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text: Sounds like wishful thinking to me.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
Look, I don't wanna be a jerk about this,
but do we have an end date for this war?
'Cause I got no interest in being a Watcher
until the dang sun burns out.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text: Victory is coming—I'm certain of it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_FUNC_MIDO_LITA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
All right, I'll buy that. I mean,
you seem pretty trustworthy.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Thanks, Musashi. I would've busted
something if you weren't there
to catch me.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text: We kugutsu have sworn to protect our master to the extent our bodies allow. Also, if you perished here, we would not be able to return to our world.

SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Makes sense to me. Also, despite the fact
this world looks pretty dang wacky,
I feel surprisingly calm about all this. Anyway, let's hit the road and figure
out where we're supposed to be going.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
So the Emerald Wave is gonna point me
to a being of power, eh? Probably best
to check that out.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Uh... Wait, you mean me?
I'm not suspicious.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Do you see anyone else standing around?
Also, you most certainly ARE suspicious!
People don't just come falling out of
the sky, not even in the Witchdom Pulchra. Now who are you, and where
did you come from?

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Now hold on just a tick there.
Is that where I am? And does
that make you an actual witch?

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
I'll ask the questions here, stranger.
Now answer me—or else.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Heck, lady, no need for the scary stuff.
So I'm Tsunanori Mido, from Miyako City.
Not that I think you'll know what any of
that means, but there ya have it.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Miyako City... Wait, that might've been
the world where Ameya was dispatched.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
So why are you here, Tsunanori Mido,
when you don't seem to even have known
this is the world of witches?

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I came here looking
for a being of power. See, there are four gods: the Black Tortoise,
the White Tiger, the Vermillion Bird, and the
Azure Dragon, and a being that possesses the
power of one of 'em must be in this world.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, and you know your spirits, too!
More suspicious by the minute...

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Say, would you mind undoing this ivy, maybe?
It kinda stings a bit—er, or stings a lot,
if I'm being honest. I mean, I'm not goin' anywhere—and
if I start actin' funny, you can just
tie me right back up.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
You're pretty cheeky for a stranger...
But I suppose you're right.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm Lita Caryx, a witch of the blue—
and I'm gonna be keeping a veeery
close eye on you for a while!

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Appreciate that. I'm not familiar with this
world, so I was hoping someone might show
me around. Pretty lucky to find somebody who
knows the score and is easy on the eyes.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
I said I'd keep an eye on you, not give you
a guided tour—so can it with the sweet talk.
Now then, where are you headed?

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
To that forest. I think there's
a being of power there.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, there's a powerful spirit there, all right—
but if a weakling like you tries to challenge it,
this little walkabout is going to end with me
rolling you into a shallow grave.

SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Huh. All right, then. Guess I'll try 
stretchin' my legs somewhere else.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Okay, so this spirit here is so weak,
it's basically a spirit in name only.
You good with that?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hey, wouldn't do me any good if I died
taking on some spirit I couldn't handle.
Also, this is the first I've ever heard
of there being strong and weak spirits.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Not sure I'd be quite so cavalier about it,
but it's your mission. Do as you like.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Okay, so not sure I'd call this spirit a
'being of power,' but it's no weakling,
either. Might be a good match for you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Sounds like a good chance to get my hands on
some power—plus a fella's gotta challenge
himself every now and again, right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_200_CUT_000_000.text:
So here's that 'being of power' you wanted.
Personally, I wouldn't come within a hundred
miles of the thing because I don't like dying,
but hey, you do you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Not really looking to get myself killed here,
but I also can't do much more than overcome
this challenge and move on to the next.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_200_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, I'll be sure to pick up any random
limbs that get torn from your body.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Hi, hey. So you WERE listening when
I told you this spirit is way out of
your league, right? ...Because it is.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_300_CUT_000_030.text:
I don't have to win here—just need
to borrow me some of its power.
Once I do that, we can skedaddle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_300_CUT_000_040.text:
Such a chipper attitude! But here's the thing:
this spirit is the guardian of the blue witches.
It's not some weak little pixie that's going to
let you wander up to it and take some power.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_999_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_999_CUT_000_000.text:
So the spirit of this forest's gonna
become another of your servants, huh?
Tsk. That's a damn shame.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_999_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_999_CUT_000_020.text: Yep. Now let's get it over with.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.text:
Sure did. Musashi was able to copy part
of the spirit's power. I'll look into just
what kind of power it is later.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.text:
All right. Then let's move on.
Which should I guide you to next?
What's a good fit for you?
Hmm... HMM... HMMMMMM...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.text:
Actually, I'll just figure it out myself.
Thanks for tryin', though.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Well, this is where I'm headed next.
Talk about bright.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Wait, what? No. This is the tower of
the Arch Witch herself—you can't
just strut on in there unless you have
an invitation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Hey, I get that, but this place is connected
to my destiny somehow. Can't tell you why
I know that, but I do.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Oh, are you a scryer now?
A fortune teller? A seer? And think very carefully before you answer,
because people who use that kind of magic
in the Witchdom tend to go blind.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Sorry, might not have been clear there.
The future's something I set for myself,
not some predetermined thing—but I'm still
sure that going this way is the right call.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Well, that slightly annoying level of
confidence still isn't going to get you
into the tower without an invitation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Well, I don't wanna go assuming anything,
but this kinda feels like the Arch Witch
is inviting me inside.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Sigh. Yes, I guess she is...
Now hurry up! She's a busy woman.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
You gonna come with me?
I'd feel better with the company.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: Only the invited may enter the tower.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
...Uh, hey there, Arch Witch! Hello!?
If you can hear me, you don't mind if
this gal here tags along, do you!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: Okay, you're good.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
...Oh, fine. I suppose I'll join
you on this road to the future.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Hey, good company makes for quick trips,
believe you me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
I'm not much for magic and hexes and
so forth, but even I can tell this place
holds tons and tons of power.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Be welcome, stranger. And you as well,
Lita—you have my thanks for bringing
this traveler to me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Cripes, lady. I'm standin' right here. Well then, Arch Witch? What do you need
with this odd little fella here?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
While this tower is a place where magical
power gathers, it also serves as a doorway
to other worlds—worlds that I know you are
most eager to visit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
If you would make use of it, however, I have
one condition: you must take Lita with you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: WHAT!? Okay, this was NOT part of—

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Your encounter with this visitor was no mere
coincidence, Lita. And while I could likely
send most any witch along with him, you are
the one who stands before me now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
The unseen hand has chosen you, child—
I merely abide that choice. Now go with this man. See and experience
what you can, then return to me and convey
what is happening in the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: ...As you wish, Arch Witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: Right then, Tsunanori. Let's go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Look, I don't want to be rude or nothing here,
but there's someone else involved in this
decision. Or do I just have to go along with
whatever you two decide, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: You don't want me to come?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Nah, that ain't it. Heck, I'd love the
company, so long as you're good with it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Ah, so you just need to be the one calling
the shots. Fine, fine. You're the protagonist,
and I'm just some sidekick. Happy?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Now if we're good here, let's go.
For real this time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Very good, young one.
I will open the Astral Gate.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_000.text: I'm not sure we should stop here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Aw, c'mon. It's a beautiful castle that just
screams 'I'm full of magic.' Heck, I bet some
witch with a fun color scheme is gonna wander
out to greet us any second here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
You live in a fancy mansion like this?
Heck, your family must be real important.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
If by family you mean mother, then yes.
Witches only have mothers, you see,
and I don't have kids yet.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, heck. I had no idea witches were into
asexual reproduction. So how's that work,
anyway? Spores? Budding?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
No, you idiot! We have fathers, we just don't
know who they are. That's simply how things
are done here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Right, gotcha. Well then,
let's go say hello to Mom.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Or we could not. Look, that could be a whole
can of worms, you know? My mother is the
leader of the blue witches; there could be
trouble if she gets her hands on you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Well, heck. I was hoping to meet the lady,
but I'm not looking to cause problems for
anybody. Probably best to move on.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Why, if it isn't Lita! It has been some
time, child. Ameya is currently out on
her trial—which I thought you knew.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I haven't come for Ameya today, Sage.
I'm just here so this strange little man
can introduce himself.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Hey there. The name's Tsunanori Mido,
and I came here from Miyako City to
find a spirit's power.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
What a coincidence! My daughter is
