currently in Miyako City, and now
here you stand.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I sensed some new thing had intruded upon
the Witchdom, but I see now it has already
been apprehended. Well done, Lita—though
I would expect no less of the next Blue Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_010.text: Well, I suppose I technically did apprehend him, but it's more like I'm...keeping an eye on him, I guess?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: RedWiseWitch

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Not planning to harm anyone, actually.
Also, rude.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Who said you could speak to me,
you insolent man!? Such a thing
requires permission first.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Well, this one seems utterly useless.
Were I you, Lita, I'd dispose of him.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I thank you for the counsel,
Red Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_090.text: While the Red Sage is a bit...aggressive, witches do tend to view non-witches as something less than human.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Woof. Rough deal. So do you folks just
not have non-witches in this world?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_110.text:
We do. Any who lack magical ability become
squires and are made to serve the witches.
They live on a remote island to the west.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Sounds neat. Think we can swing
by and check that out, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_CUT_000_130.text: Oh, strangers are definitely not allowed there. Actually, it's probably best if you just forget we ever talked about it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_000.text:
The earth ought not to be shaking
and moving, and yet here I find
people wandering aimlessly.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Luck has smiled on me today,
Yellow Sage; it's a rare thing
to find your domicile.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The witches of the blue are ever welcome
here—the earth remains bounteous thanks
to your magic, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, I'm currently showing this traveler
around the Witchdom. Fair warning, though:
he's a bit of an oddball.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, as much as I'd like for you to settle in
and relax, even I cannot say when this place
might take off again. As such, I suggest you
head out while things are still calm.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_050.text: Of course. We'll talk another time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I'd say I got the cold shoulder there,
but that would have required her to
actually realize I existed first.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Yeah, she pretty clearly hated you.
Didn't even need to say it or anything!

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_CUT_000_080.text: You witches are tough nuts to crack.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So how do we reach that fancy
Castle Black Swan?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You just pass through this channel—
I mean, assuming the Black Sage
is in a good mood.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, if the channel is flowing toward
the castle, getting there is a cinch.
But if it's flowing in the opposite
direction, it's pretty much impossible. And right now, it seems like it's
very much not a cinch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You think hitting this switch will change
the direction of the water, maybe?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Probably. The bigger question is if you
can operate a magical control panel.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Hey, won't know till I try.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Well, would ya look at that.
I did it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Yes, I suppose it was pretty easy in the end.
But don't get cocky, because you're about to
meet the Black Sage herself.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_011_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_011_0.text:
Seems like today's gonna be a bad one.
Let's skip the castle for now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_CUT_020_0.text:
I can't tell if she's welcoming you
or just doesn't trust you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_000.text: A being from another world has come into ours. This must be a sign a Calamity is close— or perhaps this being is the Calamity?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_010.text:
We should be so lucky to have the Calamity
take the form of this chump.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_020.text: Not sure how to feel about that...

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The Calamity comes with surety, and you
may yet be a part of it. Your feelings about
the matter cannot change what is to come.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_040.text:
You would do well to prepare for the
Calamity as well, witch of the blue.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Hey, so not to be rude, but can
somebody fill a guy in on this
whole Calamity deal?

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The Witchdom Pulchra is regularly beset by
phenomena called Calamities that take
different forms each time they appear. We witches are constantly honing our
magical abilities so we're ready to fight
them, because if we lose, we face ruination.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_070.text:
That said, we don't live our lives quaking
in fear. When a Calamity comes, it comes—
at which point we put it all on the line
to try and beat it back.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Hey, I respect that resolve.
Not like me at all, if I'm honest.

SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh, stop. I know you came here looking
for spirits because you're bearing your
own kind of burden. Anyway, that's enough dark talk for one day.
For now, let's just sit back and enjoy living
in the moment—because that's the witchy way!
